## timeout() function

Returns a Promise that resolves when timer is done.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default function timeout(ms?: number): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ms | number | Milliseconds to wait before resolving the Promise |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
